title: #233: The Warlord Of Precinct 3 | Maryam Henein
description:
There is more to the polarizing and political George Floyd story that most people have never heard before, but Maryam Henein has made a career of digging into the facts where other investigative journalists fail to tread. From payoffs to payback, the characters in this great Greek tragedy step forth to deliver their lines before rushing offstage to collect their part of the proceeds from the grift of the century.

Who was the “Warlord of Precinct 3”, and why did the people on the streets know that there was a whole lot more to the story of the relationship between the cops and Floyd? Did a previous relationship exist that ties the Sinoloa Cartel into the picture as well?

From Fentynal to forgery to Floyd, there are still a whole lot of unanswered questions that the media refuses to examine. What are they worried about, losing control of their carefully crafted racism narrative and the BLM fundraising machine that goes with it? Maryam has some of the answers, but also even more questions.
